page.title: 04MID SOMERSET SHOW
page.content: THE MID SOMERSET SHOW STARTED IN 1853 AND THIS YEAR WILL BE THE ONE HUNDRED AND THIRTY THIRD SHOW.THE SHOW IS HELD IN A FIELD ON THE EDGE OF SHEPTON MALLET, ALONG THE CANNARDS GRAVE ROAD. SOME OF THE{EVENTS HELD ARE:_ FOR TRACTOR DRIVING,FODDER MAKING THERE ARE CLASSES FOR:- BULLS,COWS,SHEEP,HORSES,AND GOATS. {IN THE MAIN ARENA}THESE THINGS CAN BE SEEN:- GRAND PARADE OF HORSES AND PONIES,CATTLE,SHEEP AND GOATS.THERE IS ALSO SHOW JUMPING. THERE ARE MANY OTHER PRIZES AND TROPHIES AWARDED FOR THINGS SUCH AS {CHEESE,HOMECRAFTS-WINE,CAKES,BREAD {SHORTBREAD,SOFT TOYS,POTTERY-AND THERE {ARE CHILDRENS CLASSES. ABOUT 100 PEOPLE TAKE PART IN RUNNING THE SHOW AND 15,000 PEOPLE USUALLY ATTEND ON THE DAY.
